sentences.sContent: Do you go to school by bus or by bike?
sentences.sCn: 你去学校是乘巴士还是骑单车呢？

sentences.sContent: She usually goes to work by bike except on rainy days.
sentences.sCn: 除了雨天之外， 她总是骑自行车上班。

sentences.sContent: So the week after Easter we set off by bike on a four-day trip to Wimpfen, Amorbach, and Miltenberg.
sentences.sCn: 因此复活节后那个星期我们骑自行车出发去温普芬，阿莫巴赫和米尔藤贝格进行为期四天的旅行。
